name: Gate of the Direction of the Self
description: The gate of the direction, receiving and transmitting higher knowledge and wisdom.

when_activated.strength: Natural ability to receive and share wisdom
when_activated.guidance: Trust your intuitive knowing and share insights when invited
when_activated.warning: Don't force your knowledge on others - wait for recognition

when_undefined.guidance: Learn to discern true wisdom from conditioning
when_undefined.opportunity: Openness to multiple perspectives and teachings

stress_response.recommended_action: Return to inner authority rather than seeking external validation
